description: Update : New trophy & improvement in translation!  NEW in 2.2 : Add a new gaming mode (throttle mode) and fix issue brought by 2.1. You can now also monitor your progress for each trophy =) and some other little features. NEW in 2.1 : preCopter is now blazing fast! Add more settings, among them one to desactivate helicopter inertia. Also fixes trophy issues, add french translation, and many more features! NEW in 2.0 : Bonus mode, Endurance mode, improved difficulty, new method for generating field, settings (change field color, type...), Hall of fame with trophy, Help section, and a lot more feature to unlock...  preCopter, the eagerly awaited helicopter game, has finally hit the App catalog! Guide smoothly your helicopter through a cave full of danger, and take risks to earn more points! preCopter is an easy to pick-up and play, addictive and fun game, with beautiful 2d graphics. Have fun!
